typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceEcommerceADF
source1 derive(HashColumn = toBinary(md5(ReferrerDomain+UTMSource+UTMMedium+UTMCampaign+UTMContent)),
		CreatedOn = currentTimestamp(),
		UpdatedOn = currentTimestamp()) ~> HashCompute
HashCompute, sourceEcommerceADF lookup(source1@BrowserID == sourceEcommerceADF@BrowserID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(sourceEcommerceADF@BrowserID),
	!isNull(sourceEcommerceADF@BrowserID) && notEquals(HashColumn,HashColumn),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord, DeleteRecord)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		BrowserID as integer,
		ReferrerDomain as string,
		UTMSource as string,
		UTMMedium as string,
		UTMCampaign as string,
		UTMContent as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
